review: Was very excited to get this device as we were going to use it for our outside movie projector. I received it today 7-1-15 and went right to setting it up. initial set up was easy simple instructions to follow. all seemed to be going well until I got to the home screen. Once there I was getting network error messages telling me I was not connected to a network, My wireless router was only 12 feet from the tv I was using to set it up. it said it was connected yet would not play anything after finding no help on the "help" section of the Fire stick I contacted Amazon and spoke with a CSR. I was initially told my security encryption was not compatible, but upon further research of my actual security it was not an issue.  It was intermittently giving errors messages once I did a factory reset. it was determined that my device was damaged during shipping. A new stick has been shipped out to me and I will receive it in 2 days. Will update my review pending the outcome of the replacement stick.A few notes when you are looking at this item: You need to have an outlet to plug the device power adapter into. Amazon advertises this item as just plug it into your tv and you are ready to go.This item gets extremely hot when plugged into the Tv and the extender also gets very hot while using itUse of the extender that is included is highly recommended to boost wifi connectionThe stick uses HDMI outlet on the TV and NOT a USB connection to plug it into.
